name: The Story of Cuber-O-Loo
description:
This game was made in 3 days, for three  game jams ( I tried to note them below). I was inspired by Vimlark's game "Pick Up Prison". Mozzy's Jammy Jam :

Limitation:

Embiggen

Theme:

Make It Blocky.

Mini Jam 78: Bugs:

Theme:

 Bugs.

Limitation:

You control the Bad Guy:

Bullet Hell Jam:

Limitation:

Ten seconds.

Once upon a time, in the Blocky world of Cuber-O-Loo, a  Bad-Boss forgot what was important and began to insult his own Army in order to make himself feel better. That did not go so well! Now they are attacking him. 

You Control the bad guy who has to destroy his Army. Every ten seconds an intentional bug will appear on screen. It will wear off shortly. Make sure to avoid getting hit or you will Embiggen. If you are too big, you will die. Try to survive this Bullet Hell Nightmare.

Controls:

WASD or Left Joystick to move.

A Button(Controller) or Space bar to shoot.

Make sure to collect falling potions in order to shrink.

And, most importantly, have FUN!
